scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start --prefix client" "npm run start --prefix server"
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -am update && git push origin main
scripts.install: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix client
scripts.start: cd server && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=8192' ts-node --transpile-only src/index & cd ../client && npm start
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
